amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for embassy security, construction, and maintenance.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to insert a new section at the end of the bill prohibiting the funds made available in the Act to be used for embassy security, construction, and maintenance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Upton amendment (A012) Agreed to by recorded vote: 258 - 170 (Roll no. 73).
